::Feline::

She dodged Beholder's shots, but got hit by the others.  She fell and 
slowly got back up on her feet.  She fired her optics lazars and 
Beholder and Horn Drill.


-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Logo, reply to my mails, you know what I want.
> 
> BIC: Beholder kicks the grenade. It flies up into the air. Grenade 
gasps and
> fires up at it, making it explode in the air. Beholder fires at 
Feline 4
> times. Kracken's chest is blasted open. Mech fluid runs to the 
ground. He
> fires at Feline, 3 times. Horn Drill sees who fired and fires at 
Feline 3
> times...
